message:
I always think I can be strong
only to find out afraid of being alone
at the nights without your comfort
the stars are singing a lonely song

I have a wall of dreams
with nobody can share with
the sky withdraws the darkness
leaving flowers sleeping in leaves

unwittingly daylight is coming along
the hours I awake last so long
frightten that you've already gone
or has never come along

days come and go
without leaving any shadow
who can walk in my wall of dreams
who plant the gentle love in my heart
who can understand how it herts
what if i can meet the right one once

I am waiting for love
even once in life it's enough

链接描述
title: sleepless night
userSign: (小黑呀我的黑莓。。。普通用户努力刷机中。。。 )
